subject: Re: [junit] Re: Test-friendly, but not caller-friendly?
msgSnippet: ... Damn, I see what happened. Ant s putting warnings in the same file it where it places the output. I ll fix it. Try
messageBody:

Damn, I see what happened. Ant's putting warnings in the same file it
where it places the output. I'll fix it. Try

http://www.xom.nu/designprinciples.xhtml#d0e161
